_header: To thee now Christs dear darling
Subjects: carols, to saints; John the evangelist, saint
_description: Hymn to St. John the Evangelist — four quatrains (abac) including refrain, ‘Amice Christi Iohannes’, plus burden(dc): ‘Pray for vs to the prince of peace / Amice Crysty Iohannes’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
To þe now crystys der derlyngþat was a mayd bothe ald
                    & ȝyng…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Go help þat we be nott for sakeamici cristi
                        Iohannes
